str2: First, in the first place, before, formerly. Neuter of protos as adverb; firstly.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
A rent, as in a garment; a division, dissention. From schizo; a split or gap, literally or figuratively.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
